languages.text: "У этого лифта, господин Эдельтрад. Лорд-капитан в сопровождении архмилитанта направилась в свои покои за предметом необычайной важности. После этого мы получали только общие {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-трансляции".

traits.locale_text: "У этого лифта, господин Эдельтрад. Лорд-капитан в сопровождении архмилитанта направилась в свои покои за предметом необычайной важности. После этого мы получали только общие {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-трансляции".

languages.text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."
languages.original_text: "У этого лифта, господин Эдельтрад. Лорд-капитан в сопровождении архмилитанта направилась в свои покои за предметом необычайной важности. После этого мы получали только общие {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-трансляции".

traits.locale_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

"It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

"It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

"It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

"It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

languages.text: “我们就是在这个电梯里与她分开的，艾德萨德大师。舰长大人在首席战士的陪同下，前往她的书房取回一件极其重要的物品。在那之后，我们从她那里收到的信息，就都是{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯了。”
languages.original_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我们就是在这个电梯里与她分开的，艾德萨德大师。舰长大人在首席战士的陪同下，前往她的书房取回一件极其重要的物品。在那之后，我们从她那里收到的信息，就都是{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯了。”

languages.text: «Fue en este mismo ascensor, maestro Edelthrad. La Lord Capitán, acompañada por el Archimilitante, se dirigía a sus aposentos para recuperar un objeto de especial importancia. Después de aquello, lo siguiente que supimos de ella fue a través de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}transmisiones por voco{/g}».
languages.original_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Fue en este mismo ascensor, maestro Edelthrad. La Lord Capitán, acompañada por el Archimilitante, se dirigía a sus aposentos para recuperar un objeto de especial importancia. Después de aquello, lo siguiente que supimos de ella fue a través de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}transmisiones por voco{/g}».

languages.text: 「まさにこのエレベーターです、エデルスラド様。ロード・キャプテン様はアーク・ミリタントと一緒に、特別に重要な品物を取りに部屋へ向かいました。その後は{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスブロードキャスト{/g}でしかあの方の声を聞いていません」
languages.original_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「まさにこのエレベーターです、エデルスラド様。ロード・キャプテンはアーク・ミリタントと一緒に、特別に重要な品物を取りに部屋へ向かいました。その後は{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスブロードキャスト{/g}でしか彼女の声を聞いていません」
「まさにこのエレベーターです、エデルスラド様。ロード・キャプテン様はアーク・ミリタントと一緒に、特別に重要な品物を取りに部屋へ向かいました。その後は{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスブロードキャスト{/g}でしかあの方の声を聞いていません」

languages.text: « À cet ascenseur, maître Edelthrad. La seigneure-capitaine, accompagnée de l'archimilitant, devait se rendre dans ses quartiers pour y chercher un objet de la plus grande importance. Depuis, nous n'avons reçu de sa part que des {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}transmissions-vox{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « À cet ascenseur, maître Edelthrad. La seigneure-capitaine, accompagnée de l'archimilitant, devait se rendre dans ses quartiers pour y chercher un objet de la plus grande importance. Depuis, nous n'avons reçu de sa part que des {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}transmissions-vox{/g}. »

languages.text: "Genau an diesem Aufzug, Herr Edelthrad. Der Lord Captain wollte in Begleitung des Erzmilitant zu ihrem Quartier, um ein sehr wichtiges Objekt zu holen. Anschließend hörten wir von ihr nur noch {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Übertragungen{/g}."
languages.original_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Genau an diesem Aufzug, Herr Edelthrad. Der Lord Captain wollte in Begleitung des Erzmilitant zu ihrem Quartier, um ein sehr wichtiges Objekt zu holen. Anschließend hörten wir von ihr nur noch {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Übertragungen{/g}."

languages.text: "Hemen bu asansörde Üstat Edelthrad. Lord Kaptan, yanında Başmilitan ile bilhassa mühim bir eşyayı almak için odasına gidiyordu. Sonrasında yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks yayınlarını{/g} duyar olduk."
languages.original_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-broadcasts{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Hemen bu asansörde Üstat Edelthrad. Lord Kaptan, yanında Başmilitan ile bilhassa mühim bir eşyayı almak için odasına gidiyordu. Sonrasında yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks yayınları{/g}nı duyar olduk."

languages.original_text: "It was at this very elevator, Master Edelthrad. The Lord Captain, accompanied by the Arch-Militant, headed to her chambers to retrieve an item of particular import. After that, all we heard from her were vox-broadcasts."
